official_title: Joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating January 11-17, 1976, as Bicentennial Printing Week.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating January 11 through 17, 1976, as "Bicentennial Printing Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating January 11-17, 1976, as Bicentennial Printing Week.
